name: prometheus-site
description: Performance-forward monorepo for Qwik frontend and Bun Elysia API services.

scripts.build:site: bun run build:fragment-css && bun run --cwd apps/site build
scripts.build:web: bun run build:fragment-css && bun run --cwd apps/site build
scripts.build: bun run build:site && bun run build:api
scripts.preview: bun run build:fragment-css && bun run scripts/preview.ts
scripts.lint: bun run lint:workspace && bun run lint:api && bun run lint:web
scripts.typecheck: bunx --bun tsc -p packages/platform/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx --bun tsc -p apps/site/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx --bun tsc -p packages/core/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx --bun tsc -p packages/ui/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx --bun tsc -p packages/features/auth/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx --bun tsc -p packages/features/store/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx --bun tsc -p packages/features/messaging/tsconfig.json --noEmit && bunx --bun tsc -p packages/features/lab/tsconfig.json --noEmit
